content: Slide down the rest of the way, and you’ll come up to a Shrine for the Crouching Tiger Temple’s Cellar. In the far corner of the cellar, you’ll find a familiar friendly face - the Xu Dog you helped get medicine recipes for!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crouching_Tiger_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Crouching Tiger Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Cellar'.
The content is as follows:
Slide down the rest of the way, and you’ll come up to a Shrine for the Crouching Tiger Temple’s Cellar. In the far corner of the cellar, you’ll find a familiar friendly face - the Xu Dog you helped get medicine recipes for!
